./.title: Purpose

API.html.title: API References
API.html.body:
polling
A decorator used on request calls of remote endpoint with batch data.
Parameters

config object The decorator config.
config.interval number Time to wait between each polling call.
config.timeout number The max time to wait for the polling before abort it.



Returns Function The decorated function returns the polling result.
errorCounter
A decorator to add count of errors of the action in metrics
using the metrics client in context.
Parameters

$0 Object  (optional, default {})
$0.parseLabel   (optional, default ()=>{})
$0.value   (optional, default ()=>1)



errorHandler
A decorator to add conditional side-effect before error being thrown
e.g. It can be used together with error-metrics to create conditional error-metrics
e.g. It can also be used to handle specific error by throw error in the handler.
Parameters

$0 Object  (optional, default {})
$0.condition   (optional, default ()=>false)
$0.handler   (optional, default ()=>{})



errorMute
A decorator to mute errors when conditions are met.
Parameters

$0 Object  (optional, default {})
$0.condition   (optional, default ()=>true)



Returns (object | undefined) If the error is muted(not thrown to upper level) it is accessible in the return value.
errorRetry
A decorator to retry action until condition met or reach maxRetries.
Parameters

config   (optional, default {})

Returns (object | Array) The data returned from the original action call.
errorTag
A decorator used on actions when they are not chained with a logged upper-level call
this decorator attaches action name to the error then being thrown to a logged level.
Parameters

$0 Object  (optional, default {})
$0.tag   (optional, default (e,p,m,c,a)=>{action:a.name,message:e.message,constructor:e.constructor.name,stack:e.stack.split('\n').map(s=>s.trim())})



eventLogger
A decorator to attach standard log behaviour to action
bypass: when logger instance is not available in context
augment: parse action name and added to action meta to be chained in sub-actions
after: log success event, with options to include param and result
error: log error event, with option to parse error.
Parameters

$0 Object  (optional, default {})
$0.logParam  
$0.logResult  
$0.errorParser   (optional, default e=>e)



eventTimer
A decorator to timing action execution time in both success/error cases
and send metrics using the client attached in context.
Parameters

$0 Object  (optional, default {})
$0.parseLabel   (optional, default ()=>{})



addHooks
A decorator creator to maintain a standard pattern
so that decorator behaviour is more predictable with lgihter test.
Parameters

$0 Object  (optional, default {})
$0.bypassHook   (optional, default ()=>false)
$0.storeHook   (optional, default ()=>{})
$0.beforeHook   (optional, default ()=>{})
$0.actionHook   (optional, default (param,meta,context,action)=>action(param,meta,context))
$0.afterHook   (optional, default ()=>{})
$0.errorHook   (optional, default ()=>{})



Returns Function The decorated action function that returns the result returned by the original action function or the modified one or value returned from errorHook.
stats
Used when the exhaustive values of a label is not clear
e.g. When it is stats for errorCodes.
Parameters

labelName string The name of the label.

Returns object {[labelValue]: count}.
add
Add a new metrics unit from metrics-specs.
Parameters

$0 Object 
$0.type  
$0.name  
$0.specs ...any 



load
Load a list of metrics specs to metricsUnits.
Parameters

list Array List of metrics specs.

list
List the metrics unit instances stored in metricsUnits.
Returns object .
find
Find a metrics unit by action/type or by name(higher priority).
Parameters

$0 Object 
$0.action  
$0.type  
$0.name  



Returns object The metrics unit instance.
reset
Clear instances stored in metricsUnits and prometheus.register.
objectContains
Check if object a contains another object b by shallow equal.
Parameters

a object The bigger object.
b object The smaller object.

Returns boolean If contains.
objectOnlyKeys
Trim object keys to the target array.
Parameters

input object  The object to be trimmed.
target Array The array of target keys.

Returns object The new object with trimmed keys.
